longBusinessSummary: Ambica Agarbathies Aroma & Industries Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of incense sticks in India and internationally. It operates through Agarbathies Division and Hotel Division segments. The company also provides durbar, herbal bathies, dhoops and cones, champhor and pooja oil, Kumkum, turmeric powder, cow and buffalo ghee, and wild honey. In addition, it operates hotels in Chennai and Vishakapatnam, as well as involved in film production and distribution activities. Further, the company owns farmland with resort club house and health center. Additionally, it is involved in wind power generation business. The company was founded in 1946 and is based in Chennai, India.
